title: [Widow's Beach, Sandbar]
description: The sandbar branches off in multiple directions, each path twisting and changing with the tide, the water no longer able to reach the centermost point of the sand.  Positioned in the center is a large ivory white boulder, its surface partially reflecting light.

The sandbar opens up into multiple directions, each path twisting and changing with the tide, the water no longer able to reach the centermost point of the sand.  Positioned in the center is a large, ivory boulder, its polished surface partially reflecting light.
paths: Obvious paths: northeast, south, southwest, northwest
